message.name: ERR_ADDTOCHANGESET_XRV_CHANGESET_STATUS_NOT_OPEN
message.locale: The business object instances can be added to the change set only if the change set status is "Open".

message.name: ERR_ADDTOCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECT_PRESENT
message.locale: The %1s cannot be added to %2s as it is already present in the change set.

message.name: ERR_ADDTOCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECTS_PRESENT
message.locale: The following business objects cannot be added to %1s as it is already present in the change set: %2s.

message.name: ERR_CLONECHANGESET_XRV_RELEASED_CHANGESET_CAN_BE_CLONED
message.locale: The Change Set only with 'Released' status can be cloned.

message.name: ERR_REMOVEFROMCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECT_CAN_NOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The %1s cannot be removed from the %2s as it is in Released status.

message.name: ERR_REMOVEFROMCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECTS_CAN_NOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The following business objects cannot be removed from the %1s as it is in Released status: %2s.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_XRV_HAS_BUSINESS_OBJECTS_WITH_CYCLIC_DEPENDENCY
message.locale: The change set can not be %1c as it's business object has cyclic dependency.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_XRV_DEPENDENT_BUSINESS_OBJECT_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The change set can not be %1c as business object - %2s has dependency on business object - %3s, which does not exist.

message.name: ERR_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the required privileges to maintain this data.

message.name: ERR_REMOVEFROMCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one business object instance must be selected to remove it from the change set.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_TRANSPORT_FAILED
message.locale: The transport action has failed. %1s

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_EXISTS_IN_TARGET_SYSTEM
message.locale: The change set, %1s, already exists on the target system. The same change set cannot be transported again.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_MISMATCH_IN_PRODUCT_VERSION
message.locale: The product versions of Curam application on the source system and on the target system are not compatible.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_MISMATCH_IN_LOACLE
message.locale: The locale(s) of the source system and the target system are not compatible.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_IS_CORRUPT
message.locale: The Change Set, %1s, seems to have been tampered with during transmission or storage.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_XML_IS_INVALID_WITH_SCHEMA
message.locale: The Change Set is not valid with the schema provided.

message.name: ERR_DELETECHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_IS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Change Set is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESETNAME_XRV_ALREADY_PRESENT
message.locale: A change set with the name %1s already exists. Please enter a new name and try again.

message.name: ERR_MODIFYCHANGESET_FV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this record as it has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_ADDTOCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECT_TYPE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one business object type must be selected to search for business object instances.

message.name: ERR_ADDTOCHANGESET_XRV_BUSINESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one business object instance must be selected to add it to the change set.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_XRV_DEPENDENT_BUSINESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: At least one business object instance must be selected to add it to the change set.

message.name: ERR_SYSTEM_NAME_NOT_CONFIGURED
message.locale: The change set cannot be released or applied as the system identifier is not configured.

message.name: ERR_NO_LANDSCAPE
message.locale: The change set cannot be transported as system is not in a landscape.

message.name: ERR_LANDSCAPE_NAME_NOT_CONFIGURED
message.locale: The change set cannot be released as the landscape name is not configured.

message.name: ERR_LANDSCAPE_DOES_NOT_MATCH
message.locale: The change set cannot be transported as both source and target systems are not in same landscape.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The change set document cannot be created for the provided configuration.

message.name: ERR_TARGET_SYSTEM_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The target system service details could not be found. Please verify the target system service details and try again.

message.name: ERR_RELEASED_CHANGESET_CANNOT_PERFORM_ACTION
message.locale: You cannot perform this action as change set has been released.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINCHANGESET_FV_FILE_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a change set file to be imported.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_NAME_HAS_REVERT_KEYWORD
message.locale: A change set name cannot contain the reserved keyword, - Revert. Please enter a new name and try again.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINCHANGESET_XRV_CHANGESET_CONTAINS_BUSINESS_OBJECT_TYPE_ELIGIBLE_FOR_PARTIAL_REVERT
message.locale: The change set selected contains %1s, which in this instance cannot be reverted. There are dependencies between it and other configuration data on the system and these dependencies would break if we attempt to remove this data.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINCHANGESET_XRV_CHANGESET_CONTAINS_BUSINESS_OBJECT_TYPES_ELIGIBLE_FOR_PARTIAL_REVERT
message.locale: The change set selected contains %1s and %2s, which in this instance cannot be reverted. There are dependencies between these and other configuration data on the system and these dependencies would break if we attempt to remove this data.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CS_APPLY_FAILURE_DEPENDENT_BO
message.locale: The change set cannot be applied as '%1s' dependent business object(s) have not been added to the change set.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_EXISTS_IN_TARGET_SYSTEM_ON_IMPORT
message.locale: The change set, %1s, already exists on the target system. The same change set cannot be imported again.

message.name: ERR_TRANSPORTCHANGESET_FV_SYSTEM_IDENTIFIER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The change set cannot be transported as the system identifier is not configured.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINCHANGESET_FV_CHANGESET_NAME_EXCEEDS_CHAR_LIMIT
message.locale: The change set name cannot contain more than 50 characters. Please enter a new name and try again.

message.name: INF_CHANGESET_FAIL_XML_PARSING
message.locale: Exception occurred while reading XML document.

message.name: INF_CHANGESET_FAIL_UTF8_ENCODING
message.locale: Failed to get character encoding.
